Text:
why does every wii game from zona torrent take like 5 times longer to unrar? 

other game rar's same size take me 5-10 minutes but zona torrent tagged stuff takes no joke 30 minutes to 1-2 HOURS.  and there's really no massive file size increase when the iso finally extracts.  they work fine, but yea, it takes forever to unrar for some reason.
Indeed it takes waaaay to long to unrar, and it's really annoying. I'd rather have it not rar'ed.
